definition: run by the local people/privately operated
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: The successful development of private colleges depends on its good ope rational mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 民辦高校的順利發展有賴於自身運行機制的完善。

sentences.english: A privately-run school shall have the qualifications of a legal person.
sentences.chinese: 民辦學校應當具備法人條件。

sentences.english: Third, analysis the problems and cause on the building of the contingent of teachers in private colleges.
sentences.chinese: 對民辦高校教師隊伍建設存在的問題和原因進行分析。

sentences.english: Pairs of Private Vocational Colleges dissatisfied with lack of self-affirmation, strong inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 對民辦高職院校感到不滿，自我肯定不足，自卑感強。

sentences.english: Article 46 Privately-run schools shall enjoy preferential taxation policy formulated by the State.
sentences.chinese: 第四十六條民辦學校享受國家規定的稅收優惠政策。

sentences.english: The legislative issue regarding the privately-run education is well worth our exploration.
sentences.chinese: 民辦教育立法問題是一個有研究價值的課題。

sentences.english: Article 58 When a privately-run school is to be terminated, it shall make financial settlement according to law.
sentences.chinese: 第五十八條民辦學校終止時，應當依法進行財務清算。

sentences.english: The appointment of professional and technical posts of those personnel shall be affirmed by the enterprise itself.
sentences.chinese: 其專業技術職務的聘任由民辦科技企業自行確定。

sentences.english: After 1994, the work finally ran onto normal route.
sentences.chinese: 1994年以後，民辦教師轉正規模化。

sentences.english: The ranks of teachers of the non-governmental vocational colleges are continuously growing and the sources of teachers have been diversified.
sentences.chinese: 民辦高校的師資隊伍也不斷壯大，師資來源日趨多樣。

sentences.english: Study Guangzhou special funds to private education system.
sentences.chinese: 研究設立廣州市民辦教育專項資金制度。

sentences.english: Article 57 When a privately-run school is to be terminated, it shall make proper arrangements for the students in school.
sentences.chinese: 第五十七條民辦學校終止時，應當妥善安置在校學生。

sentences.english: The Municipal People's Government shall set up the Special Funds for Privately-run Education Development.
sentences.chinese: 市政府設立民辦教育發展專項資金。

sentences.english: Law about governments administration to civilian operated schools should regularize it.
sentences.chinese: 法律應規範政府對民辦學校的管理行爲。

sentences.english: The second chapter is about NGE industrialization.
Student's psychological well-run vocational crisis in preventive education.
sentences.chinese: 做好民辦高職學生心理危機的預防性教育。
